trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls used to track and manage related groups of controls.
trans-unit.target: Contiene un insieme di controlli <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> utilizzati per tenere traccia e gestire gruppi di controlli correlati.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controls to manage sets of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> classe è una raccolta di sola lettura di controlli, in genere utilizzato da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlli per gestire i set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object to keep a list of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a page, whereas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object to track the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that it contains.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlli utilizza una <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto per mantenere un elenco di tutti il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli in una pagina, mentre un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controlli utilizza una <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetti per tenere traccia di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli in esso contenuti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> collection contains both <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls) that are placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones and used as part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> insieme contiene sia <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli e altri controlli server (ad esempio i controlli utente, i controlli personalizzati e controlli ASP.NET) che vengono inseriti in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone e utilizzati come parte delle applicazioni Web part.

trans-unit.source: So, for example, if you have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone in a page, and within it you declare a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, both controls will be in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, ad esempio, se dispone di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> in una pagina della zona e all'interno di esso si dichiara un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo e ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> (controllo), saranno entrambi i controlli nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> raccolta a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object exists so that the Web Parts control set can work with strongly typed collections.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto esiste in modo che il set di controlli Web part può funzionare con le raccolte fortemente tipizzate.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if you want to perform mass operations on a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can get a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, se si desidera eseguire le operazioni di massa in un set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli, è possibile ottenere un riferimento a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to loop through all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a page and change their appearance in some way.
trans-unit.target: È ad esempio per ciclo di tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli in una pagina e modificarne l'aspetto in qualche modo.

trans-unit.source: Even though the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Anche se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto è di sola lettura, è possibile apportare modifiche a livello di codice alle proprietà dei controlli sottostanti a cui viene fatto riferimento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto in una pagina Web part.

trans-unit.source: This example has three parts:
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è costituito da tre parti:

trans-unit.source: The code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: Il codice per la pagina in una classe parziale.

trans-unit.source: The Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: La pagina Web che contiene i controlli.

trans-unit.source: A description of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: Descrizione del funzionamento dell'esempio in un browser.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: La prima parte dell'esempio di codice contiene il codice per la pagina in una classe parziale.

trans-unit.source: Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object that consists of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which includes all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il `Button1_Click` metodo crea un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto costituito da tutti il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà, che include tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli della pagina.

trans-unit.source: The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo scorre tutti i controlli e attiva o disattiva ogni controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> proprietà che determina se il controllo è ridotta a icona o normale.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: La seconda parte dell'esempio di codice è la pagina Web che contiene i controlli.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, the controls are automatically treated as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at run time and therefore are included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che i controlli dichiarati in `WebPartZone1` sono controlli server ASP.NET standard, ma poiché essi vengono inclusi come <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controlli in fase di esecuzione e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> classe eredita il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (classe), i controlli vengono automaticamente considerati <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli in fase di esecuzione e pertanto sono inclusi nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser and click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, the code in the partial class loops through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver caricato la pagina in un browser e fare clic su di **Toggle ChromeState** pulsante, il codice nella classe parziale consente di scorrere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto alternativamente riduce al minimo i controlli o li restituisce al normale.

trans-unit.source: Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.
trans-unit.target: Oppure, se si fa clic ripetutamente il **Toggle BulletedList1 titolo** pulsante, il titolo del controllo più viene modificato in valori alternativi.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza vuota della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor initializes an empty instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore inizializza un'istanza vuota della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: The object itself is read-only and has no method to add individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to it; therefore, you will have little occasion to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto stesso è di sola lettura e non contiene alcun metodo per aggiungere singoli <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli; pertanto, sarà necessario little occasione per utilizzare questo costruttore.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Insieme <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> di controlli <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> object by passing in an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> passando in un insieme <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> di controlli <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class by passing in a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore inizializza un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> classe passando una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli.

trans-unit.source: Although a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object is read-only and there is no method for adding individual controls to it, you can create your own <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of controls, and pass that to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto è di sola lettura ed è presente alcun metodo per aggiungere singoli controlli, è possibile creare <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> raccolta di controlli e passarlo al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to create custom collections and perform bulk operations on them.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo è possibile creare raccolte personalizzate e operazioni bulk.

trans-unit.source: You can also access the underlying controls in the collection and change their property values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile accedere ai controlli sottostanti nella raccolta e modificarne i valori di proprietà a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore in una pagina Web part.

trans-unit.source: This example has three parts:
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è costituito da tre parti:

trans-unit.source: The code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: Il codice per la pagina in una classe parziale.

trans-unit.source: The Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: La pagina Web che contiene i controlli.

trans-unit.source: A description of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: Descrizione del funzionamento dell'esempio in un browser.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: La prima parte dell'esempio di codice contiene il codice per la pagina in una classe parziale.

trans-unit.source: Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object that consists of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which includes all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il `Button1_Click` metodo crea un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto costituito da tutti il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà, che include tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli della pagina.

trans-unit.source: The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo scorre tutti i controlli e attiva o disattiva ogni controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> proprietà che determina se il controllo è ridotta a icona o normale.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: La seconda parte dell'esempio di codice è la pagina Web che contiene i controlli.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, the controls are automatically treated as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at run time and therefore are included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che i controlli dichiarati in `WebPartZone1` sono controlli server ASP.NET standard, ma poiché essi vengono inclusi come <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controlli in fase di esecuzione e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> classe eredita il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (classe), i controlli vengono automaticamente considerati <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli in fase di esecuzione e pertanto sono inclusi nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, and notice that the code in the partial class loops through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver caricato la pagina in un browser, fare clic su di **Toggle ChromeState** pulsante e notare che il codice nella classe parziale consente di scorrere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto alternativamente riduce al minimo i controlli o li restituisce al normale.

trans-unit.source: Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.
trans-unit.target: Oppure, se si fa clic ripetutamente il **Toggle BulletedList1 titolo** pulsante, il titolo del controllo più viene modificato in valori alternativi.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webParts" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webParts" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An object in the <paramref name="webParts" /> collection is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di un oggetto nell'insieme <paramref name="webParts" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- oppure -

trans-unit.source: An object in the <paramref name="webParts" /> collection is not a of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto nell'insieme <paramref name="webParts" /> non è di tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> che viene verificato per determinare se è incluso nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica la presenza di un particolare controllo nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica la presenza di un determinato controllo nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> object and determine whether it is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Contains%2A> metodo consente di controllare un determinato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> dell'oggetto e determinare se fa parte di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> in cui è contenuto l'insieme copiato.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Punto di partenza nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'insieme in una matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.CopyTo%2A> method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.CopyTo%2A> metodo è utile quando si desidera comporre una matrice di tipo personalizzata che può contenere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> i controlli di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto, un subset di tali controlli o un superset dei controlli.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> che corrisponde a un membro dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Integer che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.IndexOf%2A> method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one control relative to the others.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.IndexOf%2A> metodo è utile se si dispone di più <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli in una pagina Web part ed è necessario conoscere la posizione ordinale di un controllo rispetto agli altri.

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific member of the collection according to its position or a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro specifico dell'insieme a seconda della relativa posizione o di un identificatore univoco.

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Indice di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> specifico in un insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro dell'insieme in base alla relativa posizione nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> nell'indice specificato nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indexer allows you to access the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object by index, and change their property values or call methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indicizzatore consente di accedere all'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> dell'oggetto in base all'indice e modificarne i valori di proprietà o chiamare i metodi.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indexer on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indicizzatore in una pagina Web part.

trans-unit.source: This example has three parts:
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è costituito da tre parti:

trans-unit.source: The code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: Il codice per la pagina in una classe parziale.

trans-unit.source: The Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: La pagina Web che contiene i controlli.

trans-unit.source: A description of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: Descrizione del funzionamento dell'esempio in un browser.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: La prima parte dell'esempio di codice contiene il codice per la pagina in una classe parziale.

trans-unit.source: Note that the `Button2_Click` method creates an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object, then assigns to it the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls from the `WebPartZone1.WebParts` property.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il `Button2_Click` metodo crea un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto, quindi assegna il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> dei controlli di `WebPartZone1.WebParts` proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The method accesses the first control in the collection by using its index, and toggles its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo accede al primo controllo nella raccolta utilizzando il relativo indice e attiva o disattiva il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A> valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: La seconda parte dell'esempio di codice è la pagina Web che contiene i controlli.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, the controls can be treated as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at run time and made part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che i controlli dichiarati in `WebPartZone1` sono controlli server ASP.NET standard, ma poiché essi vengono inclusi come <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controlli in fase di esecuzione e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> classe eredita il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (classe), i controlli possono essere considerati come <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli in fase di esecuzione e pertanto inclusi in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, and notice that the code toggles the title of the control between the two available title choices.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver caricato la pagina in un browser, fare clic su di **Toggle BulletedList1 titolo** pulsante e notare che il codice attiva e disattiva il titolo del controllo tra due scelte disponibili.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore univoco di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> specifico in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro dell'insieme in base a un identificatore di stringa univoco.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> in the collection whose ID equals the value of <paramref name="id" />.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> nell'insieme il cui ID corrisponde al valore di <paramref name="id" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indexer enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indicizzatore consente di accedere a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto in base a un identificatore univoco.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set performs case-insensitive matching on this property, so case sensitivity is not part of a unique `id` value.
trans-unit.target: Il set di controlli Web part esegue una corrispondenza che tra maiuscole e minuscole, pertanto distinzione maiuscole/minuscole non è parte di un elemento univoco `id` valore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> property also works to identify members of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object in some specialized cases.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> proprietà può essere utilizzata anche per identificare i membri di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> oggetto in alcuni casi speciali.

trans-unit.source: In the case of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls, the indexer is able to match the identifier for the underlying child control wrapped by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: In caso di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controlli, l'indicizzatore è in grado di corrispondenza l'identificatore del controllo figlio sottostante di cui è stato eseguito il wrapping di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controllo.

trans-unit.source: In the case of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> controls, the indexer matches the identifier for the control based on a case-insensitive comparison of the `id` parameter and either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: In caso di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> controlli, l'indicizzatore corrisponde all'identificatore del controllo basato su un confronto tra maiuscole e minuscole del `id` parametro e il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> i valori delle proprietà.
